name: floyd-workspace
description: FLOYD CLI - AI Coding Agent Workspace

scripts.install:all: npm ci && npm run install:core && npm run install:cli && npm run install:web && npm run install:chrome
scripts.install:desktop: echo 'Desktop (Electron) is deprecated - use FloydDesktopWeb instead'
scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:cli
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.start:cli: cd INK/floyd-cli && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.type-check: cd packages/floyd-agent-core && npm run build && cd ../../INK/floyd-cli && npm run build && cd ../../FloydDesktopWeb && npm run build && cd ../FloydChromeBuild/floydchrome && npm run typecheck
